panels.description: The cost of a particular cluster is the sum of individual cost estimations of its instances, the logic supports on-demand and spot prices.
panels.title: Cost Breakdown

targets.expr: sum(node_load1 {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)/count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode='system'}) by (cluster_id, instance)

1-(sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)) / (sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance))

rate(node_vmstat_pswpin {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_vmstat_pswpout {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))
avg by (mode, cluster_id, instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job='node_scraper',cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode != "idle"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="system"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="user"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="idle"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="iowait"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="steal"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance', mode="irq"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper',  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper',  cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance', mode="nice"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster',instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode="softirq"} [$__rate_interval]))/sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

sum(node_load1 {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)/count(node_cpu_seconds_total{job='node_scraper',  cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance', mode='system'}) by (cluster_id, instance)
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_disk_io_time_weighted_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))

((sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$__rate_interval])))+(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$__rate_interval]))))/((sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$__rate_interval]))) + (sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}[$__rate_interval]))))

(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])))/(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])))

(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])))/(sum by (job, cluster_id, instance)(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])))

1-(sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance)) / (sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}) by (cluster_id, instance))

rate(node_vmstat_pswpin {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_vmstat_pswpout {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval])
process_open_fds {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}/ process_max_fds {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'}
sum by (job, cluster_id, instance) (rate(node_filesystem_device_error {job='node_scraper', cluster_id=~'$cluster', instance=~'$instance'} [$__rate_interval]))
